1.caption_en:

Promotional cover for "Platforms for Future" — titled "Expert Talks" and featuring two circular headshots over a wireframe world map with the tagline "with B2B ecosystem professionals & platform founders." The design uses a blue/teal tech aesthetic and includes three sponsor logos along the bottom.
